definitions.definition: Anything that is provided or furnished by an environment to an organism dwelling within it.
A potential transaction or operation that is made possible by a given object or environment ; especially , one that is made easily discoverable.
Any interactive control or component serving as a cue to the user to take some action.
examples: The grab handles on the edges of this image are affordances that the user can exploit to change the size of the image.

main_definition: ( psychology , philosophy , robotics ) Anything that is provided or furnished by an environment to an organism dwelling within it.
secondary_definitions: ( human-machine interaction ) A potential transaction or operation that is made possible by a given object or environment ; especially , one that is made easily discoverable.
( graphical user interface ) Any interactive control or component serving as a cue to the user to take some action.
